domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

entity.name: First coronavirus case confirmed in Africa, Egyptian officials say
entity.description: On Friday, Egyptian health authorities said Africa’s first coronavirus case had been confirmed. The country's health minister said the affected person is a “foreigner” who is currently in isolation.

text: @Acyn And imagine this, the Chinese and some other citizens of wonderful Russia 🇷🇺, think that the Coronavirus was invented by the CIA. Likewise, there is a widespread illusion about Aids, that it was created to kill Africans. By now, clear thinkers have all given up on the human race
